snippet: Acting President Guy Scott sought on Tuesday to defuse a political clash by rescinding his decision to dismiss the leader of the governing party.
abstract: Acting Pres Guy Scott of Zambia rescinds decision to dismiss Edgar Lungu, leader of the governing party; move is aimed at defusing political clash that flared up following order.
lead_paragraph: Acting President Guy Scott sought on Tuesday to defuse a political clash by rescinding his decision to dismiss the leader of the governing party.
